name: How I Lost My $50,000 Twitter Username
caption: medium.com
description: A story of how PayPal and GoDaddy allowed the attack and caused me to lose my $50,000 Twitter username.

data.message: I also found out that you could easily gain access to sensitive information from HSBC with a little bit of Social engineering at least that was the case back in 2009 or 2010 :)
